meanings.definition: A type of blackberry, specifically a cultivar of the trailing blackberry developed in Oregon.
meanings.sent1: I picked a ripe marionberry from the bush.
meanings.sent2: The marionberry plant grows well in the Pacific Northwest.
meanings.sent3: Why did the marionberry blush? Because it saw the raspberry dressing!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as sweet as a juicy marionberry.
meanings.sent5: The marionberry's deep purple color stood out against the green leaves.

meanings.definition: The fruit of the marionberry plant, typically used in jams, pies, and other desserts.
meanings.sent1: Grandma made a delicious marionberry pie for dessert.
meanings.sent2: The jam tasted even better with fresh marionberries.
meanings.sent3: The marionberry whispered to the apple, 'I'm the berry best!'
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a freshly picked marionberry.
meanings.sent5: The scent of marionberries filled the kitchen as the pie baked.
